text: Brooke White (born June 2, 1983) is an American indie pop singer and songwriter. She was the fifth place finalist on the 7th season of American Idol. Her first album, Songs from the Attic, was released in 2005. Her first post-idol record, High Hopes & Heartbreak, was released in 2009. White was born in Phoenix, Arizona. She was raised in Mesa, Arizona. == Other websites == * ==References== Category:People from Mesa, Arizona Category:Musicians from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Singers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American Idol contestants
title: Brooke White
